thread.title: The adidas NMD R1 Returns Next Month in Two Fresh Colorways
thread.title_full: The adidas NMD R1 Returns Next Month in Two Fresh Colorways

author: Graeme Campbell
title: The adidas NMD R1 Returns Next Month in Two Fresh Colorways
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
If, like most of the sneaker community, you took the L on some of the recent NMD drops , then chin up, as March might be your time to shine. adidas has announced its all-conquering R1 iteration sneaker will return next month in two updated colorways: dark blue and deep red.
The old motto of “if it isn’t broke don’t fix it” rings true here, with the creps sticking to the tried-and-tested blueprint of function meets form. Each sneaker comes resting atop a crisp white Boost sole and includes a white pull tab. Black plugs are incorporated at the rear, while the front tabs blend with the stretch mesh upper. No-nonsense and no surprises: just more NMD goodness.
Look out for further information on these as it emerges. In the meantime, don’t sleep on this “ Solid Grey ” NMD_R1.
